attributes.action: Get my dad to let me adopt Timber & Dakota
attributes.additional_details:
If amount of signatures is reached, get my father to let me adopt Dakota & Timber from the local Dogs Trust or he should be deported to Jordan.
https://www.dogstrust.org.uk/rehoming/dogs/dog/filters/rod~900~~~~n~/1125688/timber
